abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed credit of US$4 million
            equivalent would finance the estimated foreign exchange
            costs of: (a) construction and equipment for: three new
            lower secondary schools and equipment only for three
            existing ones; six new multilateral upper secondary schools;
            two new primary teacher training colleges and extension of
            three others; (b) 13 man-years of specialists' services
            and 8 man-years of fellowships; and (c) a unit for the
            implementation and supervision of the project.
